name: Boss of the Rating
description:
Make your island the most profitable in the world! Work hard or employ minions to work for you. Collect ancient puzzle artifacts and receive the secret letter, which is somehow connected with the story of the island. Become the boss of the islands and compete with the others!

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Enter - to continue the dialog
  • E / Space - interact
  • I - open inventory
  • J - open journal
  • O - open shop
  • G - open artifacts panel
  • Tab - open leaderboard

Note 1: in order to play online (to be shown in leaderboard), download Windows build. In WebGL build just press "Play offline".

Note 2: first login into the game works as registration. You can use the same login and password later. If you receive "Invalid login or password" message - try to change your login.

Game was made for VimJam2

Used assets:

https://www.zapsplat.com/page/2/?s=Button&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-...

https://opengameart.org/content/spirit-of-valley
